decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Existing Elevations, Existing Floor Plans, Proposed Elevations, Proposed Floor Plans, Block Plan Received 22/12/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order) no enlargement of the premises or any additional structures/buildings within the curtilage of the site shall be carried out.
Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the new frontage of the house hereby permitted shall match those of the neighbouring proerty 141 Thornbury Road.
Condition : 5 - There shall be no access formed to the highway from the site without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority obtained

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the information shown in the approved plans no development shall take place until details of a forecourt landscaping plan have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and the details so approved shall be implemented before the development is brought into use.
description: Change of use of ground floor shop from A2 to C3 use class with front and rear elevational changes
